item.title: 中国工商银行下调存款利率以巩固创纪录的低利润率
item.description: 中国最大的贷款机构--中国工商银行股份有限公司降低了部分存款产品的利率，缓解了此前贷款利率下调对利润率造成的压力。【原文：Industrial & Commercial Bank of China Ltd., the nation’s largest lender, lowered the rates on some deposit products, easing pressure on profit margins following earlier cuts to lending rates.】

item.title: 一家美国能源公司被收购，备忘录股票投资者损失数百万美元
item.description: 对于比约恩-博斯（Bjorn Bos）和其他在过去几年中涌入美国能源公司泰利瑞安（Tellurian Inc.【原文：For Bjorn Bos and other retail investors who piled into US energy company Tellurian Inc. in the last few years, it wasn’t meant to end this way.】

item.title: 二叠纪生产商斗牛士提高 2024 年石油产量计划
item.description: 斗牛士资源公司（Matador Resources Co.）计划在2024年抽取比原先预期更多的石油，这表明美国油田产量最高的二叠纪盆地西段的油井正在给钻井商带来惊喜，并增加了全国的石油供应量。【原文：Matador Resources Co. plans to pump more oil in 2024 than it originally expected, a sign that wells in the western section of the Permian Basin – the most prolific US oil field – are surprising drillers to the upside and bolstering national supply.】

item.title: 贝纳通集团考虑出售意大利眼科护理公司 Sifi
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝纳通家族后裔亚历山德罗-贝纳通（Alessandro Benetton）领导的私募股权投资公司正在考虑出售意大利眼部护理公司西菲公司（Sifi）。【原文：The private equity firm led by Benetton family scion Alessandro Benetton is considering a sale of Italian eye-care firm Sifi after backing the business for almost a decade, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 了解禽流感和对新流行病的担忧
item.description: 对于流感病毒来说，不完美就是优势。它们会不断变异，产生新的病毒株，挑战免疫系统对抗早期病毒的能力。正因为如此，流感对人类和易受其感染的动物物种（主要是鸟类）构成了终生威胁。【原文：For influenza viruses, imperfection is a strength. They constantly mutate, producing new strains that challenge immune systems primed to fight earlier varieties. That’s what makes flu a life-long threat to humans and the animal species — mainly birds — that are vulnerable to it.】

item.title: 特朗普交易错过了 1,530 亿美元的小额贷款定价税收风险
item.description: 1530 亿美元的市政债券市场为机场、住房机构和非营利组织提供资金，这种交易方式就像对除最富有的美国人之外的所有美国人征税一样，会反噬中产阶级。【原文：A $153 billion pocket of the municipal-bond market that finances airports, housing agencies and nonprofits is trading like a tax on all but the wealthiest Americans will return to bite the middle class.】

item.title: 英国央行公布非银行紧急贷款机制设计方案
item.description: 英格兰银行披露了一项新机制的细节，该机制旨在通过直接向资产管理公司提供贷款，避免英国债券市场出现类似两年前的暴跌。【原文：The Bank of England revealed details of a new facility designed to avoid UK bond market blow-ups like the one two years ago by lending directly to asset managers.】

item.title: Gildan 重新上任的首席执行官因外汇交易卷入税务纠纷
item.description: 格伦-查曼迪（Glenn Chamandy），这位曾与服装制造商 Gildan Activewear Inc. 董事会斗争并赢回旧工作的高管，现在有了另一个对手：加拿大税务机关。【原文：Glenn Chamandy, the executive who fought the board of apparel maker Gildan Activewear Inc. and won his old job back, has another opponent now: tax authorities in Canada.】

item.title: 康菲石油在欧洲市场取得 18 年期比利时液化天然气协议
item.description: ConocoPhillips has gained access to Belgium’s liquefied natural gas import terminal for 18 years as part of the company’s expansion into lucrative European markets.

item.title: 俄罗斯泵送更多天然气以满足更高的出口和本地需求
item.description: 随着对欧洲和中国出口的增加以及国内需求的增长，俄罗斯上半年的天然气产量提高了 8.2%。【原文：Russia raised gas production by 8.2% in the first half of the year, as exports to Europe and China increased and demand strengthened at home.】

item.title: 首席执行官称，禁止压裂将使 EQT 的产量减少 25
item.description: 页岩钻探公司 EQT Corp. 首席执行官托比-赖斯（Toby Rice）表示，如果美国禁止压裂法，该公司的产量将下降约 25%。【原文：Production at shale driller EQT Corp. would drop by about 25% if fracking was banned in the US, Chief Executive Officer Toby Rice said.】

item.title: 米其林考虑因欧洲经济下滑而关闭更多工厂
item.description: 米其林表示，欧洲 "经济形势严峻 "导致不同行业的轮胎需求下降，从而导致该地区产能过剩。【原文：Michelin said Europe’s “difficult economic situation” is causing a drop in tire demand across different sectors that is leading to overcapacity in the region.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉与英国石油公司和特立尼达签署天然气出口协议
item.description: 委内瑞拉与英国石油公司（BP Plc）和特立尼达岛达成了一项为期 20 年的天然气生产和勘探协议，这一备受期待的举措旨在将这个南美国家转变为主要的天然气出口国。【原文：Venezuela agreed on a 20-year natural gas production and exploration deal with BP Plc and Trinidad, a hotly anticipated move to transform the South American nation into a major exporter of the fuel.】

item.title: 4.9 亿美元首次公开募股后，KKR 支持的 OneStream 股价上涨 29
item.description: OneStream Inc. 软件公司及其部分股东在首次公开募股中筹集了约 4.9 亿美元，该公司股价大涨 29%，拉开了今年美国最大 IPO 周的序幕。【原文：OneStream Inc. shares jumped 29% after the software company and some of its shareholders raised about $490 million in an initial public offering, kicking off the year’s biggest US IPO week.】

item.title: 爱沙尼亚将国防开支占 GDP 的 4% 作为遏制俄罗斯的目标
item.description: 在俄罗斯入侵乌克兰之后，爱沙尼亚计划在未来两年内将国防开支提高到国内生产总值的 4%，这是北约中最高的水平之一，用于购买弹药和加强国家安全。【原文：Estonia plans to raise defense spending to 4% of gross domestic product, one of the highest levels in NATO, over the next two years to buy ammunition and bolster national security after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚金融监管机构称银行正从困境中复苏
item.description: 哥伦比亚金融监督机构称，哥伦比亚银行正在从紧缩货币政策引发的贷款违约激增中恢复过来。【原文：Colombia’s banks are recovering from a surge in loan defaults triggered by tight monetary policy, according to the nation’s financial watchdog.】

item.title: 加州葡萄酒制造商以需求下降为由申请破产
item.description: 美国最大的葡萄酒生产商之一 Vintage Wine Estates Inc.【原文：Vintage Wine Estates Inc., one of the largest wine producers in the United States, filed for bankruptcy, citing a decline in demand for wine following the end of pandemic lockdowns.】

item.title: 分析师看衰特斯拉股票，特斯拉股价反弹后走低
item.description: 在特斯拉公司发布财报之前，投资者一直在寻找该公司电动汽车业务的稳定迹象，以及令人眼花缭乱的自动驾驶汽车即将问世的蛛丝马迹。但他们一无所获。【原文：Before Tesla Inc.’s results, investors were looking for signs of stability in the company’s electric-car business and some hint that a dazzling self-driving vehicle was imminent. They got neither.】

item.title: 埃利奥特支持的 Tyko 为迈阿密新办公大楼贷款 5.65 亿美元
item.description: 由埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）支持的房地产公司 Tyko Capital 正在为迈阿密布里克尔 830 号大楼提供 5.65 亿美元的贷款，这座 55 层高的摩天大楼已经吸引了 Citadel、微软公司和私募股权公司 Thoma Bravo 成为租户。【原文：Tyko Capital, a real estate firm backed by Elliott Investment Management, is lending $565 million to 830 Brickell in Miami, a new 55-story skyscraper that has already lured Citadel, Microsoft Corp. and private equity firm Thoma Bravo as tenants.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所 IPO 领导人约翰-塔特尔离开交易所，转投 Acrisure
item.description: 约翰-塔特尔（John Tuttle）是纽约证券交易所（New York Stock Exchange）的资深人士，曾帮助该交易所完成了一些著名的首次公开募股。【原文：John Tuttle, the New York Stock Exchange veteran who helped land some of its marquee initial public offerings, is leaving after nearly two decades to join a fintech firm.】

item.title: 数据疲软支撑美联储降息预期，国债收益率下滑
item.description: 由于市场猜测美联储官员将很快下调美国利率，两年期国债收益率跌至 2 月份以来的最低点。【原文：The yield on two-year Treasuries plunged to the lowest since February as speculation mounted that Federal Reserve officials will soon cut US interest rates.】

item.title: 多伦多看到 2022 年以来首家新外国矿商上市的 "胜利 "曙光
item.description: 帕拉丁能源有限公司（Paladin Energy Ltd.）登陆加拿大，标志着自 2022 年以来，首次有大型外国矿业公司在多伦多证券交易所上市。【原文：Paladin Energy Ltd.’s arrival in Canada marks the first time since 2022 that a large foreign mining company will list its shares on the Toronto Stock Exchange, which has seen new corporate listings slow to a crawl.】

item.title: 堪萨斯城酋长队球员马奎斯-布朗创办房地产公司
item.description: 堪萨斯城酋长队外接手马奎斯-"好莱坞"-布朗（Marquise "Hollywood" Brown）正在创办一家房地产公司，专门经营加勒比海和其他度假胜地的房产。【原文：Kansas City Chiefs wide receiver Marquise “Hollywood” Brown is launching a real estate firm that will specialize in Caribbean and other resort properties.】

item.title: 卡斯尔莱克探索以 10 亿美元出售 Concora 信贷公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Castlelake 正在酝酿各种方案，包括出售消费贷款平台 Concora Credit。【原文：Castlelake is mulling options, including a sale, for consumer-lending platform Concora Credit, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国商业活动创两年多来最大增幅
item.description: 由于服务业需求强劲，美国 7 月初的商业活动以两年多来最快的速度加速，而衡量物价的指标则有所降温。【原文：US business activity accelerated in early July at the fastest pace in more than two years on stronger services demand, while a gauge of prices received cooled.】

item.title: 邦吉公司 82 亿美元的 Viterra 交易将获得欧盟有条件批准
item.description: 邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）计划以 82 亿美元收购 Viterra 公司（Viterra Inc.【原文：Bunge Global SA’s planned $8.2 billion buyout of Viterra Inc. is set to be approved by the European Union after concessions offered by the firms look to have appeased regulator concerns.】

item.title: 塞文特伦特英镑债券通过水务公司债务需求测试
item.description: 英国水务公司 Severn Trent Plc 的英镑债券销售需求旺盛，为陷入困境的英国水务行业注入了一针强心剂。【原文：British water utility Severn Trent Plc has pulled in strong demand for a pound bond sale in a boost for the beleaguered UK water sector.】

item.title: 前英国皇家经济委员会官员预测工党增税高达 250 亿英镑
item.description: 据前英格兰银行决策者迈克尔-桑德斯（Michael Saunders）称，英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）可能会利用即将进行的工党财政继承审查，为即将到来的预算案增税高达 250 亿英镑（323 亿美元）提供理由。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves could use an imminent review of Labour’s fiscal inheritance to justify tax increases of up to £25 billion ($32.3 billion) in the upcoming budget, according to former Bank of England policymaker Michael Saunders.】

item.title: 中国经济低迷令美国和欧洲石油在亚洲过于昂贵
item.description: 中国经济的不景气使美国和欧洲的石油在亚洲越来越没有竞争力，亚洲的炼油商将更青睐离家近的供应。【原文：China’s lackluster economy is helping to make oil from the US and Europe increasingly uncompetitive in Asia, where refiners are set to favor supply that’s closer to home.】
